title: Behold Esports LF Plat - Top and ADC players
body:
Hello,
As above states the org is looking for a top and Adc for the plat team to compete in regular Iron to Plat tourneys. The team aims to improve and win these tourneys, earning both experience in a team environment and to earn RP.
Please feel free to either message here or add me on LoL/Discord
Discord: LiLWilly#4179
League: Mister E

replies.body:
I am a Top lane main, I'm a decent ADC too and ive recently started actually playing ranked, made my way to plat just today. I don't know if you'd be interested but my Discord is : Smol Scarf Boi#3044

I've never joined a team or anything before but im looking for some decent players to learn with, and play with, going 100% solo is draining.
